ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» Experience Graduate Research Assistant @ Deloitte Touches x Commonwealth Cyber Initiatives â–ª Tech Stack: Python, Tensorflow, Matplotlib, Pandas, Seaborn. â–ª Date: 05/2022 - 08/2022. â–ª Location: Arlington, Virginia. Responsibilities â–ª Forecasted water levels and localized overflowed water tanks during storms by applying a temporal deep-learning model; reduced 25-30% total operation/maintenance costs and prevented pollution to DC's local rivers. â–ª Built an interactable explainable dashboard using the MDS algorithm for the literature database; provided new insights for stakeholders. â–ª Implemented TimeGAN; synthesized the dataset by 50%, improved prediction accuracy by 4%, and gained more data from stakeholders. Research Assistant @ Terrestrial Robotics Engineering & Controls Lab (Virginia Tech) â–ª Tech Stack: C#, C++, Unity.         â–ª Date: 09/2021 - 05/2022. â–ª Location: Blacksburg, Virginia. Responsibilities â–ª Improved transparency by applying ROS-Bridge data transfer pipeline between the low-level robotic controller and Unity. â–ª Created 3D interactive simulation environments in Unity with VR headsets and Haptix Gloves synchronization. â–ª Poster, Presentation. Machine Learning Intern @ Heron Systems (Shield AI Subsidiary) â–ª Tech Stack: Python, Javascript, PyTorch, Pandas, Plotly, SpaCy, Flask, MySQL. â–ª Date: 05/2021 - 08/2021. â–ª Location: Alexandria, Virginia. Responsibilities â–ª Coded custom neural networks for classifying army-winning probabilities in DARPA's Game Breaker program. â–ª Assured RNN/LSTM/GRU/Transformer-based models' performance before product deployment by developing NLP evaluation tests. â–ª Built a web dashboard showing army composition and deep learning model prediction results; contributed to the company's second round of funding from DARPA by providing demonstrative use cases of the dashboard in the final presentation and report. Research Assistant @ Geo Lab (William & Mary College) â–ª Tech Stack: Python, Tensorflow, Matplotlib. â–ª Date: 09/2020 - 05/2021. â–ª Location: Williamsburg, Virginia. Responsibilities â–ª Led a team of 5 to develop CNN models for road quality classification via satellite images, combined with AutoEncoder for data-poisoning defense tasks; won 3rd place (out of 8 competing universities) in model performance and contributions. â–ª Contributed 30% of the benchmark dataset by collecting and balancing classes with image augmentation techniques. Research Assistant @ Hybrid Electric Vehicle Team (Virginia Tech) â–ª Tech Stack: C++, MATLAB.             â–ª Date: 09/2020 - 05/2021. â–ª Location: Blacksburg, Virginia. Responsibilities â–ª Applied Sensor Fusion algorithm to Chevrolet Blazer 2019 by integrating/testing Borsh radar and Mobileye6 camera sensors. â–ª Implemented and tested the algorithm's performance in simulation; earned full points in the EcoCar Competition's road driving tests. Teaching Assistant @ Integrate System Design (Virginia Tech) â–ª Tech Stack: C++, Circuit Design, Arduino, MIT Mobile App Inventor. â–ª Date: 05/2020 - 05/2021. â–ª Location: Blacksburg, Virginia. Responsibilities â–ª Assisted instructors in grading assignments and mentoring 25 students in the semester-long Smart Home Simulation project. Research Assistant @ Wireless Lab (Virginia Tech) â–ª Tech Stack: C++, Python. â–ª Date: 05/2020 - 08/2020. â–ª Location: Blacksburg, Virginia. Responsibilities â–ª Designed a controller with two stepper motors using Python, Arduino, and GRBL library for long-range signal receiving or signal sweeping tasks. The user can control the Antenna's movements through their preferred angles by entering the angles in the Python scripted interface. ğŸ”§ Skills Languages: Python, SQL, Java, Javascript, HTML, CSS. Web Development Tools: Flask, Vue.js, MySQL, SQLite, Git, Docker, Figma. Data Science Tools: Tensorflow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, NumPy, Matplotlib, Pandas, Seaborn, Plotly, BeautifulSoup, OpenCV. ğŸ“ Education Master of Science in Computer Engineering â–ª Concentration: Software & Machine Intelligence. â–ª GPA: 3.82. â–ª Date: 08/2022 - 05/2024. â–ª Location: Arlington, Virginia. Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering (Graduated) â–ª Concentration: Machine Learning, Computer Science Minor. â–ª GPA: 3.62. â–ª Date: 08/2018 - 05/2022. â–ª Location: Blacksburg, Virginia. Relevant Courses â–ª Deep Learning â–ª Web Application Development â–ª Software Engineering â–ª Data Visualization â–ª Advanced Machine Learning â–ª Trustworthy Machine Learning â–ª Data Analytics â–ª Computer Vision â–ª Digital Image Processing â–ª AI & Engineering Applications â–ª Real-time Systems â–ª Data Structure & Algorithms â–ª Principles Of Computer Architecture ğŸ“œ Publication "DeepH20: Cyber attack detection in water distribution systems using deep learning." Nazmul Sikder, Minh T. Nguyen, Donald Elliot, Feras Batarseh. Elsevier's Journal of Water Process Engineering (Vol 52.) (04/2023). Link.

Flask-Y â–ª Tech Stack: Python, Javascript, MySQL, Flask API, Werkzeug API, CKEditor API, Bootstrap 5.     â–ª Redesigned Y Combinator's Hacker News to be more user-friendly (Reddit style). â–ª Developed a multi-page full-stack media web app that allows multiple users to sign-up, login, and manage/comment/vote posts. â–ª Github. Smart Home Simulation â–ª Tech Stack: C++, Circuit Design, Arduino, MIT Mobile App Inventor.         â–ª Designed, built, and tested hardware simulation with 8 automated sensors, controlled wirelessly via an Android mobile app. â–ª Appointed to class's teaching assistant by professor due to project's design, presentation, report, and assistance to classmates. â–ª Github. ğŸ… Awards FLAIRS-35 â–ª Best journal poster for ML applications in cyberbiosecurity, awarded by juries amongst 40+ submissions. â–ª Link. Turing Fellowship @ Commonwealth Cyber Initiatives â–ª Awarded AI Fellowship out of 21 universities in the Commonwealth of Virginia state. â–ª Link. Geo Fellowship @ Geo Lab â–ª One of 30 fellows (out of 150 applicants) for the US's largest geospatial data security lab. â–ª Link. ğŸ™Œ Volunteers President @ Teaching Robotics & Engineering Club at Virginia Tech â–ª Taught C/C++, Arduino, and electric foundations and robotics projects for 15-25 club members. â–ª Supervised club Officers in making teaching materials and mentoring club members. Industry Relations Chair @ IEEE Student Branch at Virginia Tech â–ª Tripled the number of participants by hosting peer networking events and info sessions to connect students to faculty-sponsored and company-sponsored opportunities in the ECE department. â–ª Collaborated with company representatives in IEEE@VT Summit, resume review sessions, and tech talks. â–ª Raised a $6,000 annual sponsorship from Collins Aerospace, Lockheed Martin, Boeing, and Texas Instruments. Student Mentor @ Center for Enhancement of Engineering Diversity at Virginia Tech â–ª Served as a sounding board for various issues that confront first-year students during the first 10 weeks. â–ª Held weekly meetings to provide 10 mentees about how to smoothly transition into Virginia Tech culture. Officer @ IEEE Student Branch at Virginia Tech â–ª Organized â€œFun Fridayâ€™sâ€ peer networking events and the IEEE Summit industry/leadership conference. Math Team Captain @ St. Paul Preparatory School â–ª Won Team Second Place in the 2017 Minnesota High School Mathematics League Tournament. â–ª Assisted the teacher with explaining difficult problems to members. â–ª Assigned math areas to different teammates based on skill sets to boost the team's total score.

title: About Me
